AzureDatalakeStoreAccount

Base URL

This is a convenience function to return the base URL for the service.

adla_url(subscription_id, resource_group_name = NULL, name = NULL)

Arguments

subscription_id

character, has form "aaaaaaaa-bbbb-cccc-dddd-eeeeeeeeeeee"
resource_group_name

character
name

character

Value

url object returned by httr::parse_url()

Examples

  adla_url(
    subscription_id = "aaaaaaaa-bbbb-cccc-dddd-eeeeeeeeeeee",
    resource_group_name = "foo",
    name = "bar"
  )
#> $scheme
#> [1] "https"
#> 
#> $hostname
#> [1] "management.azure.com"
#> 
#> $port
#> NULL
#> 
#> $path
#> [1] "subscriptions/aaaaaaaa-bbbb-cccc-dddd-eeeeeeeeeeee"
#> [2] "resourceGroups"                                    
#> [3] "foo"                                               
#> [4] "providers"                                         
#> [5] "Microsoft.DataLakeStore"                           
#> [6] "accounts"                                          
#> [7] "bar"                                               
#> 
#> $query
#> $query$`api-version`
#> [1] "2016-11-01"
#> 
#> 
#> $params
#> NULL
#> 
#> $fragment
#> NULL
#> 
#> $username
#> NULL
#> 
#> $password
#> NULL
#> 
#> attr(,"class")
#> [1] "url"
